column2: caption=Suladân from [[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]]

column1: '''Suladân''' is a character invented for the ''[[Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]]''.  He is or takes the place of the [[Serpent Lord]].  The game is based on [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], in which the leader of the [[Haradrim]] is one of the [[Mûmak]]-riders.
